text: "One More Night" is a 1985 song by Phil Collins. It is the leading single from their third studio album No Jacket Required. It went to number 1 in Canada and the United States, number 2 in Australia, number 4 in Ireland, the United Kingdom and Zimbabwe, number 5 in New Zealand, number 8 in the Netherlands, number 10 in Germany, number 14 in Poland and Spain, number 18 in Finland and number 21 in South Africa. ==Track listing== ===7": Virgin / VS755 (UK)=== #"One More Night" (edit) – 4:25 #"I Like the Way" ===7": Atlantic / 7-89588 (U.S.)=== #"One More Night" (edit) – 4:25 #"The Man with the Horn" ===12": Virgin / VS755-12 (UK)=== #"One More Night" (Extended Mix) – 6:24 #"I Like the Way" ===CD: WEA International / WPCR 2064 (Japan)=== #"One More Night" #"I Like the Way" ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Phil Collins songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: One More Night (Phil Collins song)
